original_text: And the measuring line shall yet go forth over against it upon the hill Gareb, and shall compass about to Goath.
korean_text: 측량줄이 곧게 가렙 언덕 밑에 이르고 고아로 돌아

sentences.original_text: And the measuring line shall yet go forth
sentences.korean_translation: 그 측량 선은 아직도 나아갈 것이라

sentences.original_text: and shall compass about to Goath
